alert.note: Alert for Barceloneta; Florida; Manati; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 06 at 3:02AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...River flooding caused by the previous rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Barceloneta, Florida, Manati, Vega Alta and Vega Baja. * WHEN...Until 600 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 259 AM AST, USGS river sensors indicate that the area rivers are either elevated or over the flood stage. Emergency managers confirm that Rio Grande de Manati and Rio Cibuco are still over their flood stage. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Barceloneta; Florida; Manati; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
